title: Thief

properties.name: description
properties.value: A thief is a criminal found in various places around RuneScape, and can be a challenge for new or low level players. They can be either male or female. One of their characteristics is that they will stop attacking and try to escape when at low health.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:ThiefThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Thief

A thief is a criminal found in various places around RuneScape, and can be a challenge for new or low level players. They can be either male or female. One of their characteristics is that they will stop attacking and try to escape when at low health.

  • 2 Drops

    • 2.4 Herbs
    • 2.5 Coins
    • 2.6 Other
    • 2.7 Tertiary
  • 3 Drops (Plain)
    • 3.1 100%
  • 4 Changes
